subject: Dear xxx,
body:
Dear xxx,
I got your email approving us to move forward with the loan. Please complete the application form that is attached and send it back to me so that the lawyer can get started on preparing the AGREEMENT LETTER and any other necessary paperwork for us to sign.
Complete the application that is attached, then send it back.
Sincere Regards,
Mr. Khalifa Salem Al-Shaikh
Mobile:  +1 (614) 391-0457

subject: Re: Dear xxx,
body:
Dear Mr. Khalifa Salem,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the loan approval. I appreciate your prompt response. I received the attached form and I will make sure to complete it as soon as possible.

Just to clarify, could you please provide some more details about the AGREEMENT LETTER? What exactly does it entail and what are the terms and conditions that will be included in it? Additionally, are there any specific documents or information that you require from me in order to proceed with this process?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Brandon
